text: E'ina hu'negu Nagra tamagri ha' vahera zamatresuge'za Nagri agonaramimpina ne-eza havi anumzante'ma mono'ma hunentaza kumatamina eme eri haviza nehu'za, zagone marerisa feno zantaminena rohu eme tamare'za eri'za vugahaze. Na'ankure tamagrama mopatamifima kumi'ma huta eri hakarema hu'naza zante anara hugahaze.
